```{r}
#| label: load-data

suppressMessages(library(tidyverse))
library(gt)
library(gtsummary)
library(glue)
devtools::load_all(here::here())

source(here::here("doc", "to_plot.R"))
load(here::here("data", "biomass.rda"))
load(here::here("data", "specimens.rda"))
load(here::here("data", "samples.rda"))
load(here::here("data", "parameters.rda"))

```

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
sp <- sort(unique(biomass$common_name))
for (a in sp) {
  to_plot(
    common_name = a,
    biomass = biomass,
    specimens = specimens,
    parameters = parameters
  )
}
```
